resources.string: Learn shogi
deur te speel!
Kieslys
Vordering: %s
Herstel my vordering
Jy sal al jou vordering verloor!
speel!
Shogi pieces
Introduction
Let\'s learn some basics.
Your journey begins here.

It\'s important that you can tell your pieces apart, so make sure you choose the right piece set. \nTo do that click on the cog wheel or your username (top right corner) and then click on \"piece set\".
When some of your pieces reach or leave the first three ranks in your opponent\'s territory you can choose to promote your piece and make it stronger.
You now know some basics, but this part of tutorial is still under construction. For now learn how individual pieces move.
Die toring
Hy beweeg in reguit lyne
Die toring is \'n sterk stuk. Is jy reg om sy bevelvoerder te wees?
Click on the rook to bring it to the star!
The rook promotes to the powerful dragon. Don\'t forget that you can also promote your piece when you leave the promotion zone.
The rook can go up, down, left or right as much as it wants.
It can move just like the unpromoted rook, but also one square in any diagonal direction, making it much stronger.
Gryp al die sterre!
The fewer moves you make, the more points you win!
Geluk! Jy het die werking van die toring suksesvol bemeester.
Die loper
Hy beweeg diagonaal
Volgende sal ons leer hoe om die loper te manovre!
Promoting your bishop will make it stronger, it will turn into a piece called \"the horse\".
The bishop moves in any diagonal direction.
The promoted bishop moves also diagonally, but it can also go one square up, down, left or right as well.
Welgedaan! Jy is die loper se bevelvoerder.
Die koning
Die belangrikste stuk
Jy is die koning. As jy sneuwel, is die wedstryd verlore.
The king is rather slow.
King can move in any direction, but only by one sqaure.
Jy kan nou bevele aan die bevelvoerder gee!
Die ruiter
It moves in an L shape, but only FORWARD!
Here\'s another challenge for you. The knight is... a tricky piece.
Knights have a fancy way of jumping around!
Knights can jump over obstacles!
The knight can jump in an L shape forward, but only by two squares forward and one square sideways. Its movement also isn\'t restricted by other pieces - it will just jump over them.
Promoted knight moves are completely different from the unpromoted knight, but you can notice it moves the same as the gold general, so make sure to study that one thoroughly.
The knight can also be promoted. His movements change a lot after that, so pay attention.
Knap gedaan! Jy het die ruiter bemeester.
Die pion
March forward!
Pionne is swak, maar hulle het groot potensiaal.
Pawns can move to the square directly in front of them, they capture the same way.
The pawn can also be promoted, the moves are once again the same as the gold general.
Pragtig! Pionne hou geen geheimenisse vir jou nie.
The pawn is a rather straightforward piece to understand.
You should already be familiar with this pattern by now.
The lance
It can go only forward.
Use it wisely.
Just move forward as much as you can, this should be easy for you.
After the lance is promoted, it moves differently, but you\'ve already seen this somewhere - same as the gold general.
Moves forward, this is really easy.
It\'s the same as the gold general.
Great job!
The gold general
The gold general moves in any direction EXCEPT diagonally back.
The gold general movements might be a bit harder to remember at first, but you can surely do it.
The gold general together with the king is the only piece you CAN\'T promote.
Try to remember these moves, many pieces move the same after they are promoted.
Congratulations! You got this.
The silver general
The silver general moves either forward or diagonally back.
Another piece with unusual movements, but this is the last one. Promise!
When you promote the silver general his movements are the same as the gold general.
You will surely remember these moves with some practice.
Same as the gold general, you will see this a lot.
Congratulations! You are on a roll.
This piece can be promoted.
Your piece reached the promotion zone!
It can now be promoted to a stronger piece.
Kies die stuk wat jy wil hê!
Beginsels
Vat
Vat die vyandige stukke
Identifiseer die opponent se onverdedigde stukke, en vat hulle!
Vat die swart stukke!
Vat die swart stukke! En moenie joune verloor nie.
Congratulations! You know how to fight with shogi pieces!
Beskerming
Hou jou stukke veilig
Identifiseer die stuk wat jou opponent aanval, en verdedig dit!
Baie mooi! \'n Stuk wat jy nie verloor nie, is \'n stuk wat jy wen!
Jy is onder aanval! Ontsnap die bedreiging!
Daar is geen wegkomkans nie, maar jy kan verdedig!
Moenie dat hulle jou onbeskermde stukke vat nie!
Stryd
Vat en verdedig stukke
\'n Goeie kryger weet hoe om aan te val en te verdedig!
Congratulations! You know how to fight with shogi pieces!
Skaak in een
Val die opponent se koning aan
Om die opponent te skaak, val sy koning aan. Hulle moet dit verdedig!
Mik vir die opponent se koning in een skuif!
Jy is \'n ster! Jy het jou opponent geforseer om sy koning te verdedig deur hom te skaak!
Uit skaak uit
Verdedig jou koning
Jy is in skaak! Jy moet ontsnap of die aanval blok.
Ontsnap met die koning!
Die koning kan nie ontsnap nie, maar jy kan die aanval blok!
Jy kan uit skaak uit kom deur die aanvallende stuk te vat.
Die ruiter skaak jou regdeur jou verdediging!
Ontsnap met die koning of blok die aanval!
Pragtig! Jou koning kan nooit gevat word nie, maak seker jy kan teen \'n skaak verdedig!
Mat in een
Oorwin die opponent se koning
Jy wen wanneer jou opponent nie homself teen skaak kan verdedig nie.
Val jou opponent se koning aan op \'n manier wat nie verdedig kan word nie!
Congratulations! That is how you win shogi games!
Intermediêr
Bord opstelling
Hoe die wedstryd begin
Die twee weermagte staar mekaar in die oë, reg vir die geveg.
This is the initial position of every game of shogi! Make any move to continue.
Sit die torings eerste op hulle plek! Hulle hoort in die hoeke.
Plaas die ruiters volgende! Hulle staan langs die torings.
Plaas die lopers op hulle plek! Hulle kom langsaan die ruiters.
Plaas die dame op haar blokkie! Sy staan op haar eie kleur.
Plaas die koning op sy blokkie! Hy staan reg langs sy dame.
Pionne vorm die voorste linie. Maak enige skuif om voort te gaan.
Congratulations! You know how to set up the shogi board.
Pat
Die spel is gelykop
Wanneer \'n speler nie in skaak is nie en nie \'n wettige skuif het nie, is dit pat. Die spel is gelykop: niemand wen nie, niemand verloor nie.
Om swart te pat moet: - Swart nêrens kan skuif nie - Daar geen skaak wees nie.
Mooi skoot! Dit is beter om gepat te word as gemat te word!
Gevorderd
Stuk waarde
Evalueer stuk sterkte
Stukke met \'n hoë beweeglikheid het \'n hoër waarde! Dame = 9 Toring = 5 Loper = 3 Ruiter = 3 Pion = 1 Die koning is van onskatbare waarde! Verloor die koning en jy verloor die spel.
Vat die stuk met die hoogste waarde! Dame > Loper
Vat die stuk met die hoogste waarde!
Jy is aan die brand! Jy ken die waarde van materiaal! Dame = 9 Toring = 5 Loper = 3 Ruiter = 3 Pion = 1
Skaak in twee
Twee skuiwe om \'n skaak te gee
Vind die regte kombinasie van twee skuiwe wat die opponent se koning skaak!
Dreig die opponent se koning in twee skuiwe!
Jy is \'n legende! Jy het jou opponent gedwing om sy koning te beskerm, deur hom te skaak!
Wat nou?
You know how to play shogi, congratulations! Do you want to become a stronger player?
Registreer
Get a free Lishogi account
Oefen
Learn common shogi positions
Kopkrappers
Oefen jou taktiese vermoëns
Video’s
Watch instructive shogi videos
Speel teen mense
Opponente van regoor die aarde
Speel teen rekenaar
Oefen jou vaardighede met die rekenaar
La\'t wiel!
Fase %s
Ongelooflik!
Uitstekend!
Goeie werk!
Perfek!
Uitstekend!
Knap gedaan!
Spoggerig!
Jy is \'n legende!
Mooi skoot.
Kolskoot!
Fase %s voltooi
Jou telling
Volgende
Terug na kieslys
Kopkrapper misluk!
Probeer weer
